heading: VIP shop
description: This VIP serves as a huge support for the Legends of Paragon server and everyone involved in the server. If you purchase one of these VIPs, we sincerely thank you.
CardDesc: Invoices and receipts available for easy company reimbursement
descriptionPrime: Get a Prime account for 30 days on our Minecraft server and Discord. When purchasing the same rank, it will automatically extend!
descriptionPlus: Get a Prime+ account for 30 days on our Minecraft server and Discord. When purchasing the same rank, it will automatically extend!
descriptionPro: Get a PrimePro account for 30 days on our Minecraft server and Discord. When purchasing the same rank, it will automatically extend!
